overview: Ipang and Nugi find their solace in music. They are rebellious, often miss classes, and on the lookout for trouble. They are also close friends with Sandra, another troubled youth. Ipang has to face the bitter reality of being an adopted son. Nugi comes from a broken home, his parents divorced and he is depressed when he finds out that his father is a transsexual.
title: Reality, Love, and Rock 'n' Roll
